reference.text: winning peat E21C49/00

note.note-paragraph:
This subclass covers : - primarily equipment for excavating or loosening earth or for moving loose earth;
- equipment for working similarly on other materials and similar equipment for loading or unloading materials

subnote.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
E02F3/32 covered by E02F3/30, E02F3/425
E02F3/39 covered by E02F3/286, E02F3/30K, E02F3/34K
E02F3/78 " " E02F7/76 + s.gr.
E02F3/85 " " E02F3/84A, E02F3/842, E02F3/84B, E02F3/845, E02F3/847
E02F5/04 " " E21B
E02F5/06 " " E02F3/08
E02F5/08 " " E02F3/18
E02F5/16 " " E21B
E02F5/18 " " E21B
E02F5/20 " " E21B
